products.Name: Bamboo & Sea Salt Whitening Antiplaque Toothpaste
Charcoal & Black Seed Oil Whitening Antiplaque Toothpaste
Simply Mint Whitening Toothpaste
products.Product_desc: Ditch your whitening routine and come to the plant-based side! Whitening Complete Care Simply Mint Toothpaste leverages the enzymes from Papaya and Pineapple to help whiten your teeth while removing stubborn surface stains and offering a remarkably great taste and foamy texture you’ll love.
products.Suggested_Use: Brush thoroughly after each meal, or at least twice a day, or as directed by a dentist. Consult your dentist for children under 2 years. Children under 6 years should use a pea-sized amount under adult supervision.

products.Name: Turmeric & Coconut Oil Whitening Antiplaque Toothpaste
Back To Balance Cleanse™️
products.Product_desc: To keep your body cleaner and feel less bloated, you deserve more than just a quick herbal purge. You deserve the morning and evening wisdom of Himalaya Back to Balance Cleanse, a gentle and effective two-part plant-based detox program.
products.Suggested_Use: Part One: Take one capsule in the morning after breakfast. Part two: Take one capsule in the evening after dinner.
